00033 #ifndef MSQ_EXTRA_DATA_USER_HPP
00034 #define MSQ_EXTRA_DATA_USER_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00037 #include "ExtraData.hpp"
00038 #include <assert.h>
00039 
00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 template <typename T> class ExtraUserData;
00043 
00057 template <typename T> class ExtraDataUser
00058 {
00059   public:
00060   
00061     ExtraDataUser();
00062     
00063     virtual ~ExtraDataUser();
00064   
00065     typedef T DataType;
00066     
00068     T* get_data_ptr( PatchData& patch );
00069     
00071     T& get_data( PatchData& patch );
00072     
00073     void set_data( PatchData& patch, const T& data );
00074     
00075     void notify_patch_destroyed( ExtraUserData<T>* data );
00076     
00077     virtual void notify_patch_destroyed( T& data ) = 0;
00078     
00079     virtual void notify_new_patch( PatchData& patch, T& data ) = 0;
00080     
00081     virtual void notify_sub_patch( PatchData& patch, 
00082                                    T& data, 
00083                                    PatchData& sub_patch, 
00084                                    const size_t* vertex_index_map,
00085                                    const size_t* element_index_map,
00086                                    MsqError& err ) = 0;
00087   
00088   private:
00089   
00090     ExtraUserData<T>* listHead;
00091 };
00092 
00093 template <typename T> class ExtraUserData : public ExtraData
00094 {
00095   public:
00096     
00097     ExtraDataUser<T>* dataOwner;
00098     ExtraUserData<T>* userNext;
00099     T userData;
00100     
00101     ExtraUserData( PatchData& patch, 
00102                    ExtraDataUser<T>* owner, 
00103                    ExtraUserData<T>* next,
00104                    const T& data )
00105       : ExtraData(patch), dataOwner(owner), userNext(next), userData(data)
00106       {}
00107     
00108     ExtraUserData( PatchData& patch, 
00109                    ExtraDataUser<T>* owner, 
00110                    ExtraUserData<T>* next )
00111       : ExtraData(patch), dataOwner(owner), userNext(next)
00112       {}
00113     
00114     virtual void notify_patch_destroyed();
00115     
00116     virtual void notify_new_patch();
00117     
00118     virtual void notify_sub_patch( PatchData& sub_patch, 
00119                                    const size_t* vtx_index_map,
00120                                    const size_t* elm_index_map,
00121                                    MsqError& err );
00122 };
00123     
00124 template <typename T> 
00125 void ExtraUserData<T>::notify_patch_destroyed()
00126   { dataOwner->notify_patch_destroyed( this ); }
00127 
00128 template <typename T> 
00129 void ExtraUserData<T>::notify_new_patch()
00130   { dataOwner->notify_new_patch( *get_patch_data(), userData ); }
00131 
00132 template <typename T> 
00133 void ExtraUserData<T>::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& sub, 
00134                                          const size_t* vertex_map,
00135                                          const size_t* element_map,
00136                                          MsqError& err )
00137   { dataOwner->notify_sub_patch( *get_patch_data(), userData, sub, vertex_map, element_map, err ); }
00138 
00139 template <typename T> 
00140 ExtraDataUser<T>::ExtraDataUser() : listHead(0) {}
00141 
00142 template <typename T> 
00143 ExtraDataUser<T>::~ExtraDataUser()
00144 {
00145   while (ExtraUserData<T>* dead_ptr = listHead) {
00146     listHead = dead_ptr->userNext;
00147     dead_ptr->userNext = 0;
00148     delete dead_ptr;
00149   }
00150 }
00151 
00152 template <typename T> 
00153 T* ExtraDataUser<T>::get_data_ptr( PatchData& patch )
00154 {
00155   for (ExtraUserData<T>* ptr = listHead; ptr; ptr = ptr->userNext)
00156     if (ptr->get_patch_data() == &patch)
00157       return &(ptr->userData);
00158   return 0;
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <typename T> 
00162 T& ExtraDataUser<T>::get_data( PatchData& patch )
00163 {
00164   T* ptr = get_data_ptr( patch );
00165   if (!ptr) {
00166     listHead = new ExtraUserData<T>( patch, this, listHead );
00167     ptr = &(listHead->userData);
00168   }
00169   return *ptr;
00170 }
00171 
00172 template <typename T> 
00173 void ExtraDataUser<T>::set_data( PatchData& patch, const T& data )
00174 {
00175   T* ptr = get_data_ptr( patch );
00176   if (ptr) 
00177     *ptr = data;
00178   else
00179     listHead = new ExtraUserData<T>( patch, this, listHead, data );
00180 }
00181 
00182 template <typename T> 
00183 void ExtraDataUser<T>::notify_patch_destroyed( ExtraUserData<T>* data )
00184 {
00185     // remove from list
00186   assert(listHead != 0);
00187   if (listHead == data)
00188     listHead = data->userNext;
00189   else {
00190     ExtraUserData<T>* prev;
00191     for (prev = listHead; prev->userNext != data; prev = prev->userNext)
00192       assert( prev->userNext != 0 );
00193     prev->userNext = data->userNext;
00194   }
00195   data->userNext = 0;
00196   
00197     // notify concrete class of event
00198   notify_patch_destroyed( data->userData );
00199   
00200   delete data;
00201 }
00202 
00203 } // namespace Mesquite
